Detailed Description

DTModel gives php objects some intelligent behaviors, such as simplified key-value coding-style accessors

Member Function Documentation

insert ( DTDatabase $  db = null  ) 

convenience method for basic inserts based on storageProperties()

Returns:
returns the inserted id, or false if nothing was inserted
isEqual ( DTObject $  obj  ) 

override this method if you want to compare objects by a subset of properties

Returns:
returns true if object is equal to +obj+
merge ( array $  params  ) 

attempts to set each property as defined in +params+ (but never merges id property)

Returns:
returns the number of properties updated to new values

Reimplemented in DTUser.

Storage Methods.

override this method to customize the properties that get stored

Returns:
returns an array of key-value pairs that can be used for storage
Note:
values should be properly formatted for storage (including quotes)
